home.hero_subtitle: A premier metal commodity trading company headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland, with global operations spanning from Africa and South America to North America, Europe, the Middle East, and Asia.
home.company_overview_text1: Swiss Metal Trading is a leading metal commodity trading company based in Geneva, Switzerland. We specialize in sourcing high-quality metals from producing regions, primarily in Africa and South America, and distributing them to markets across North America, Europe, the Middle East, and Asia.
home.company_overview_text2: With decades of industry experience, we have established a reputation for reliability, integrity, and excellence in the global metal commodities market. Our expertise spans the entire supply chain, from origination to distribution, ensuring seamless operations and consistent quality for our clients worldwide.
home.sourcing_text: We source high-quality metals from producing regions in Africa and South America, working directly with reliable suppliers to ensure consistent quality and ethical sourcing practices.
home.distribution_text: Our extensive distribution network spans North America, Europe, the Middle East, and Asia, allowing us to efficiently deliver commodities to markets worldwide.
home.expertise_text: With deep industry knowledge and market insights, we navigate the complexities of the global metal commodities market to deliver value to our clients and partners.
home.global_footprint_text: Our operations span multiple continents, creating a seamless bridge between metal-producing regions and global markets. With strategic presence in key locations, we ensure efficient sourcing, logistics, and distribution.
home.origination: Origination in Africa and South America
home.distribution: Distribution across North America, Europe, Middle East, and Asia
home.cta_title: Ready to Discuss Your Metal Commodity Needs?
home.cta_text: Contact our team of experts to learn how we can support your business requirements.

footer.company_description: A premier metal commodity trading company headquartered in Geneva, Switzerland with global operations.

about.hero_subtitle: Learn about our company background, organizational structure, and commitment to excellence in the global metal commodities market.
about.company_background_text1: Swiss Metal Trading was established in 1995 in Geneva, Switzerland, with a vision to become a leading player in the global metal commodities market. Over the past three decades, we have grown from a small trading operation to a significant international presence in the metal commodities sector.
about.company_background_text2: Founded by a team of industry veterans with extensive experience in metal trading and international commerce, our company was built on the principles of integrity, reliability, and excellence. These core values continue to guide our operations today as we connect metal producers with markets worldwide.
about.company_background_text3: Our strategic location in Geneva, Switzerland—a global hub for commodity trading—has allowed us to develop strong relationships with financial institutions, logistics partners, and industry stakeholders, further strengthening our position in the market.
about.mission_text: To facilitate the efficient and responsible flow of metal commodities from producing regions to global markets, creating value for our partners and contributing to sustainable industrial development worldwide.
about.value_integrity: Integrity: We conduct business with honesty and transparency.
about.value_excellence: Excellence: We strive for the highest standards in all our operations.
about.value_reliability: Reliability: We deliver on our commitments to partners and clients.
about.value_responsibility: Responsibility: We operate with respect for communities and the environment.
about.value_innovation: Innovation: We continuously improve our processes and services.
about.org_structure_text: Swiss Metal Trading operates with a streamlined organizational structure designed to maximize efficiency and expertise across our global operations. Our company is organized into specialized divisions that work in close coordination to ensure seamless service delivery.
about.geneva_hq_text1: Our global headquarters is strategically located in Geneva, Switzerland, a city renowned as a global hub for commodity trading and international commerce. From this central location, we coordinate our worldwide operations and maintain close connections with financial institutions, industry partners, and regulatory bodies.
about.geneva_hq_text2: The Geneva headquarters houses our executive leadership, central trading operations, and key administrative functions. Our modern facilities are designed to foster collaboration and innovation while providing our team with the resources needed to serve our global network effectively.
about.regulatory_text: At Swiss Metal Trading, we maintain the highest standards of regulatory compliance across all our operations. We adhere to international trade regulations, financial reporting standards, and industry best practices to ensure transparent and responsible business conduct.
about.learn_more_operations: Want to Learn More About Our Operations?

operations.hero_subtitle: Discover how we connect metal-producing regions with global markets through our integrated business model and extensive distribution network.
operations.business_model_text1: Swiss Metal Trading operates on a comprehensive business model that spans the entire metal commodities value chain. Our core operations involve originating high-quality metals from producing regions, primarily in Africa and South America, and distributing them to industrial markets across North America, Europe, the Middle East, and Asia.
operations.business_model_text2: Our integrated approach allows us to maintain quality control throughout the supply chain while optimizing logistics and ensuring timely delivery to our clients. By maintaining direct relationships with producers and end-users, we create value through efficient market access, risk management, and supply chain optimization.
operations.sourcing_text: Identifying and securing quality metal commodities from producing regions
operations.logistics_text: Coordinating transportation and warehousing across global supply chains
operations.trading_text: Executing strategic trades and managing market risks
operations.distribution_text: Delivering commodities to industrial clients and markets worldwide
operations.origination_text: Our origination operations focus on sourcing high-quality metal commodities from key producing regions, primarily in Africa and South America. We work directly with miners, processors, and local partners to secure reliable supply while ensuring adherence to quality standards and responsible sourcing practices.
operations.distribution_network_text: Our extensive distribution network spans four continents, allowing us to efficiently deliver metal commodities to industrial clients worldwide. From our strategic hub in Geneva, we coordinate global logistics and maintain regional distribution centers to ensure timely delivery and responsive service.
operations.metals_text: Swiss Metal Trading specializes in a diverse portfolio of metal commodities, focusing on base metals that are essential to global industrial production. Our expertise spans the following key metal categories:
operations.operational_processes_text: Our operational processes are designed to ensure efficiency, reliability, and quality control throughout the metal commodities supply chain. From mine to market, we implement rigorous procedures to maintain the integrity of our products and the effectiveness of our services.
operations.explore_products: Explore our product range and specifications to find the right metals for your industrial needs.

products.hero_subtitle: Explore our comprehensive portfolio of metal commodities, including detailed specifications, grades, and sourcing information.
products.portfolio_text: Swiss Metal Trading specializes in a diverse range of metal commodities essential to global industrial production. We source high-quality metals from reliable producers in Africa, South America, and other regions, ensuring consistent quality and responsible sourcing practices. Our product portfolio includes base metals, minor metals, and specialty products that serve various industrial applications.
products.additional_products_text: In addition to our core metal commodities, Swiss Metal Trading offers a range of other metal products to meet diverse industrial needs. For detailed specifications and availability of these products, please contact our sales team.
products.quality_assurance_text: At Swiss Metal Trading, quality assurance is integral to our operations. We implement rigorous quality control measures throughout our supply chain to ensure all metal commodities meet international standards and client specifications.
products.ready_discuss: Ready to Discuss Your Metal Commodity Requirements?
products.contact_sales: Contact our team to learn more about our products, specifications, and availability.

global.hero_subtitle: Discover our worldwide operations spanning from metal-producing regions in Africa and South America to distribution networks across North America, Europe, the Middle East, and Asia.
global.network_text: Swiss Metal Trading operates a comprehensive global network that connects metal-producing regions with markets worldwide. From our headquarters in Geneva, Switzerland, we coordinate operations across six continents, ensuring efficient sourcing, logistics, and distribution of metal commodities.
global.origination_text: Our metal origination operations focus on key producing regions in Africa and South America, where we work directly with miners, processors, and local partners to secure high-quality metal commodities while ensuring responsible sourcing practices.
global.distribution_text: From our strategic hub in Geneva, Switzerland, we coordinate the distribution of metal commodities to markets worldwide. Our extensive distribution network spans North America, Europe, the Middle East, and Asia, ensuring efficient delivery and responsive service to our clients.
global.offices_text: To support our global operations, Swiss Metal Trading maintains strategic regional offices and representatives in key locations worldwide. These local teams ensure close coordination with suppliers, logistics partners, and clients, while providing deep market knowledge and responsive service.
global.connect_network: Ready to Connect with Our Global Network?
global.connect_text: Contact us to learn how our worldwide operations can support your metal commodity needs.

contact.hero_subtitle: Reach out to discuss your metal commodity needs or learn more about our global operations.
contact.get_in_touch_text: Whether you're interested in our metal commodities, seeking information about our operations, or exploring potential partnerships, our team is ready to assist you. Contact us using the information below or fill out the form to send us a message.
contact.office_hours_text:
Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM CET
Saturday - Sunday: Closed
contact.subject: Subject *
contact.gdpr_consent: I consent to Swiss Metal Trading processing my personal data in accordance with their Privacy Policy. *
contact.ready_explore: Ready to Explore Our Metal Commodities?
contact.learn_more: Learn more about our products and global operations.
